name: Mortal Kombat 3
description: Get ready for the fight of your life... Eight selectable fighters - including 6 new characters and 1 fighter hidden within the game! Five direct-from-the-arcade backgrounds to keep you jumping! Secret portals that allow you to smash up and down into different backgrounds for the ultimate bi-level battlefield! New fatalities and babalities! Intense, fully-digitized fighters for the most realistic action you've ever encountered!
